ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to make the robot to precisely travel to specified coordinates on the playing field. In order to accurately do so, it uses the odometer.
    Author:
    Kevin
